data.name: Pascal's triangle on a graph
data.description:
If you don't know what pascal's triangle is,go to <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pascal's_triangle> to learn about it.</br>
pascal's triangle can be represented on a graph like so:</br>
`^  1  4  10 20`</br>
`|  1  3  6  10`</br>
`|  1  2  3  4`</br>
`y  1  1  1  1`</br>
`  x --------->`</br>

which still follows the rule.Your job is to find the value of any value on this graph,given its coordinates</br>
Ex:</br>
solution(4,5):</br>
`^  1  5  15 35`</br>
`|  1  4  10 20`</br>
`|  1  3  6  10`</br>
`|  1  2  3  4`</br>
`y  1  1  1  1`</br>
`  x --------->`</br>
The answer  is 35 because the space 4 spaces right and 5 spaces up of the origin is 35 on the graph.</br>
Expect x and y to be positive integers and their sum to be less than 30
